languages.text: "Я бы на вашем месте, Лорд-капитан, поделал бы тут дела побыстрее и валил бы... пока можем. Видал я такое один раз, тоже в этом регионе. Может, ваши придворные колдуны получше объяснят, что к чему, а я вот что добавлю: такое дерьмо обычно ничем хорошим не заканчивается".

"If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."
languages.original_text: "Я бы на вашем месте, Лорд-капитан, поделал бы тут дела побыстрее и валил бы... пока можем. Видал я такое один раз, тоже в этом регионе. Может, ваши придворные колдуны получше объяснят, что к чему, а я вот что добавлю: такое дерьмо обычно ничем хорошим не заканчивается".

traits.locale_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

"If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

"If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

"If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

languages.text: “如果我是你，船长老大，我会赶紧把该干的事干完，之后趁……还能走得了的时候，赶紧走。我以前在这片星区见过类似的情况。或许你的巫师可以解释清楚这到底是怎么回事，但要我说的话，这种狗屁倒灶的地方绝对没好事。”
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是你，船长老大，我会赶紧把该干的事干完，之后趁……还能走得了的时候，赶紧走。我以前在这片星区见过类似的情况。或许你的巫师可以解释清楚这到底是怎么回事，但要我说的话，这种狗屁倒灶的地方绝对没好事。”

languages.text: «Si yo fuera usted, Lord Capi, haría lo que he venido a hacer bien rapidito y para fuera... mientras aún pueda largarme. He visto más casos como este en la región. Seguro que sus hechiceros pueden explicárselo mejor, pero lo que yo sé es que esta mierda nunca acaba bien».
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: «Si yo fuera usted, Lord Capi, haría lo que he venido a hacer bien rapidito y para fuera... mientras aún pueda largarme. He visto más casos como este en la región. Seguro que sus hechiceros pueden explicárselo mejor, pero lo que yo sé es que esta mierda nunca acaba bien».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、もし我が御身であれば、我はここに来た目的を迅速にやり遂げるでしょう…まだできるうちに。我は前にもこの地域でこのような光景を見たことがあります。陛下のソーサラーであればもっとうまく説明することでしょうが、我が知っているのは、こんなクソみたいなことは決していい終わり方をしないってことだけです」
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、もし我が御身であれば、我はここに来た目的を迅速にやり遂げるでしょう…まだできるうちに。我は前にもこの地域でこのような光景を見たことがあります。陛下のソーサラーであればもっとうまく説明することでしょうが、我が知っているのは、こんなクソみたいなことは決していい終わり方をしないってことだけです」

languages.text: « Si j'étais vous, je ferais ce qu'on est venus faire ici fissa et je repartirais aussi sec... tant que c'est encore possible. J'ai déjà vu des trucs de ce genre dans la région. Vos sorciers sauront peut-être vous l'expliquer mieux que moi, mais voilà ce que je sais : les embrouilles de ce genre, ça finit rarement bien. »
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'étais vous, je ferais ce qu'on est venus faire ici fissa et je repartirais aussi sec... tant que c'est encore possible. J'ai déjà vu des trucs de ce genre dans la région. Vos sorciers sauront peut-être vous l'expliquer mieux que moi, mais voilà ce que je sais : les embrouilles de ce genre, ça finit rarement bien. »

languages.text: "An Eurer Stelle, Lord Cap'n, würde ich schnell erledigen, weshalb wir hier sind, und dann abhauen ... solange wir noch können. Ich habe ähnliche Zustände in dieser Region früher schon gesehen. Vielleicht können Eure Hexer es besser erklären, aber ich weiß eins: Scheiße wie diese nimmt nie ein gutes Ende."
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: "An Eurer Stelle, Lord Cap'n, würde ich schnell erledigen, weshalb wir hier sind, und dann abhauen ... solange wir noch können. Ich habe ähnliche Zustände in dieser Region früher schon gesehen. Vielleicht können Eure Hexer es besser erklären, aber ich weiß eins: Scheiße wie diese nimmt nie ein gutes Ende."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, yerinizde olsam buraya her ne yapmaya geldiysem... Hâlâ yapabiliyorken derhâl yapıp giderim. Aynı bölgede böyle bir şeyi daha önce görmüştüm. Belki sahirlerimiz durumu benden daha iyi açıklar. Benim bildiğimse böyle haltların sonunun asla iyi olmadığıdır."
languages.original_text: "If I was you, Lord Cap'n, I'd do what I came here to do right sharpish and clear out... while we still can. I've seen the likes of this before in this same region. Maybe your sorcerers will be able to explain it better, but here's what I know: shit like this never ends well."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, sizin yerinizde olsam, buraya her ne yapmaya geldiysem derhâl yaparım ve hemen uzarım. Hâlâ yapabiliyorken. Aynı bölgede böyle bir şey daha önce görmüştüm. Belki sahirlerimiz benden daha iyi açıklar ama bildiğim şu ki: Böyle haltların sonu asla iyi bitmez."
